title: Colour Spray
content:
ription: Blind creatures up to a combined 33 hit points. Level: Lvl 1 Spell School: Illusion Casting Time: Action Range: 5m/17ft Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None Additional Details: Affects a 17ft cone area.

Colour Spray (Condition)

Duration: 1 Turn

Ranged attacks and spells have a range of 15ft and attack rolls suffer disadvantage. Attack rolls against Blinded creatures have advantage.

How to Acquire Colour Spray

Colour spray can be acquired by the following classes:

Eldritch
